file_content.text: Reactivating the energy shield now. Keep those walkers away, and Vel'lik should come out fine.
Garith and his men are in position. Powering on the turrets, and then I'm taking cover.
Some free advice? That baby's triple-thick durasteel. Gonna take something with a little punch to bring her down.
Very creative. Now go for the guts!
The walker is designed to resist melee attacks, master. Please, try something else--for both our sakes!
Quick, master! Kill it before it gets up again!
Observation: The walker is hardened against conventional deletion, master. A new technique may be required.
Target compromised. Move in for the kill, master!
Fought these things on Balmorra. Blasters aren't gonna cut it--need something big, loud and explosive.
Took fifty of us to do that on Balmorra. Get in close and finish it off!
That armor looks too thick for lightsabers. Any missile launchers lying around out here?
Nice moves, Master Jedi. Lightsabers ought to work now!
Plasma and ion cells ineffective, sir. Recommend heavy ordnance... if we can find any.
The enemy is vulnerable. Engage and destroy!
Lightsabers will not pierce this flesh. We must bring the walker down by other means.
Now is your chance, Jedi. Strike while the walker is down!
Walker plating = 75% durasteel + 15% cortosis // Conventional weapons = ineffective
Walker = disabled // Jedi + T7 = charge!
That'll wake a fella up. Energy shield's holding, but I'd look to those walkers if I were you.
Whatever you're gonna do, Master Jedi, do it faster. Vel'lik's getting hammered!
Another village saved by the fearsome Jedi and his plucky engineer!
Seriously, great job. Captain Maddox and the rest of the gang's landing now. Meet you back in Vel'lik.
Another village saved by the fearsome Jedi and her plucky engineer!
